name: Arduino forum minimal (Simple Machines Forum)
description: Once again, getting rid of huge irritating margins and line heights, enlarging some mini-font-sizes and aligning unnessecary block-stacked elements.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.

additional_info: 26/1/2014 I reduced the content wrapper width to 900px for more density on post pages, as opposed to the tables listing topics, which are 90% wide.
